review_body: My wife & I stayed here between 26th February-01 March 2020.It was my first visit to Tokyo although a shock to the system ( Tokyo) we live in the country itâ€™s very quiet.The Hotel was fantastic we had a corner king room a great location the staff were excellent helpful efficient and we plan to return.A special thank you to the girls at the Concierge desk ( Amy Lin & Miyuki Nishikawa for sorting out our return flights to London on Japan airlines who were also fantastic.Would recommend a trip to Japan especially this Hotel fantastic.Mark&Fiona Sullivan

Very nice place to stay, next to the park, close to all shops and restaurants. Staff very nice, bakery, SPA, shops and swimming pool really good. Great "no cleaning" deal, supporting the environment. Spacious room, with great view, Jacuzzi in the bath tub etc. Only prices and table charge for every drink in a sky bar were a disgrace.

The room was spacious and clean. Service was good with staffs being able to provide accurate information. The staffs at reception and health club could communicate in English well. One needs to pay to use the indoor heated pool and onsen. The pool was meant for lap swim and there was lifeguard all the time. The train station was about 10 to 15 mins walk from the hotel. I used the free shuttle bus from hotel to the nearest station too. I might consider returning to the hotel if I am keen to swim and use onsen while in Tokyo.
